name: Stack.Me
description:
DESCRIPTION

Stack.Me is a One Button Game where you must stack tiles and stay alive as long as you can. Every misplacement of tile will decrease your surface area where you can place your tiles.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

  • Left Mouse Button - Place tiles
  • Pause - Esc or P

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

KEEP IN MIND

Every time you place a tile and even if it is slightly off, it will break and you will have less space to place your next tile

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

DEVELOPMENT TEAM

  • Henrique Zanchet - Project Manager, Game Art, Game Design and Webpage Design

(https://hzanchet.itch.io/)

  • Baris Ozguz - Programmer, Game Art, UI Design and SFX

(https://cadentt.itch.io/)
